title: How Netflix Could Ruin The Witcher
description:
This video is sponsored by Brilliant. Go to https://brilliant.org/Midnight/ and sign up for free, the first 200 people that go to that link will get 20% off the annual Premium subscription.
Henry Cavill is leaving The Witcher, being replaced by Liam Hemsworth. What does this mean for the series, and it's new spin-off, The Witcher: Blood Origins? I get into it here.
